content.content: Long time to be stuck by the DC, while ETH-A has to be increased dramatically for several times! (Small DC, only 50M, while ETH-A is 1000M now!) Long time to be stuck but STABILITY FEE increased from 5% to 6.5%.  Are you trying to drive users away from this vault? Why making it so weird?

Derek98, ETH-B is much riskier to MakerDAO that ETH-A due to the lower collateralization  requirement. Max Debt Ceiling that were based on thresholds where Risk Premium start reaching double digit values, in case of ETH-B around 14% at 50m. This assessment indicates that 6.5% stability is low.

Please don’t talk stablity fee as an isolated part. When the whole DC dramatically increased and no change of ETH-B, then the global risk gets down. Also, when we’re using DefiSaver to control vault automatically, the rist dramatically gets down. Now, ETH-B’s DC is 49.18M, what the hell…is happenning?
